Name: Hyperstrix
About the game: For a while people lived in prosperity. They were building an empire and didn't suspect anything. Humans have discovered life on Mars, and awakened an ancient evil. The aliens have risen up to take control of everything. The Empire has chosen you to protect humanity. Your ship is ready for battle! Hyperstrix is an arcade indie rail shooter that puts you in control of a spaceship. Game Features: 15 levels with increasing difficulty the style of each level changes Pixel art graphics Retrowave music
